name: Bipty Boppin'
description:
Made for Major Jam 3: Retro

Controls:

  • numpad7 for the top left bop
  • numpad8 for the center top bop
  • numpad9 for the top right bop
  • numpad4 for the center left bop
  • numpad5 for the center bop
  • numpad6 for the center right bop
  • numpad1 for the bottom left bop
  • numpad2 for the center bottom bop
  • numpad3 for the bottom right bop

Bop' em!
